name: dataload

scripts.migrate:doctors-with-offices: npm run migrate:offices && npm run migrate:doctors
scripts.migrate:patients-with-deps: npm run migrate:offices && npm run migrate:doctors && npm run migrate:patients
scripts.migrate:orders-with-deps: npm run migrate:offices && npm run migrate:doctors && npm run migrate:patients && npm run migrate:orders
scripts.migrate:core: npm run migrate:offices && npm run migrate:profiles && npm run migrate:doctors
scripts.migrate:core-with-patients: npm run migrate:offices && npm run migrate:profiles && npm run migrate:doctors && npm run migrate:patients
scripts.migrate:all: npm run migrate:offices && npm run migrate:profiles && npm run migrate:doctors && npm run migrate:patients && npm run migrate:orders && npm run migrate:products && npm run migrate:jaws
scripts.validate:core: npm run validate:offices && npm run validate:profiles && npm run validate:doctors
scripts.validate:core-with-patients: npm run validate:offices && npm run validate:profiles && npm run validate:doctors && npm run validate:patients
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:offices && npm run validate:profiles && npm run validate:doctors && npm run validate:patients && npm run validate:orders && npm run validate:products && npm run validate:jaws
scripts.rollback:core: npm run rollback:doctors && npm run rollback:profiles && npm run rollback:offices
scripts.rollback:core-with-patients: npm run rollback:patients && npm run rollback:doctors && npm run rollback:profiles && npm run rollback:offices
scripts.rollback:all: npm run rollback:jaws && npm run rollback:products && npm run rollback:orders && npm run rollback:patients && npm run rollback:doctors && npm run rollback:profiles && npm run rollback:offices
scripts.migrate:complete-final: npm run migrate:missing-doctor-71 && npm run migrate:remaining-orders && npm run validate:final
scripts.migrate:products-with-deps: npm run migrate:offices && npm run migrate:profiles && npm run migrate:doctors && npm run migrate:patients && npm run migrate:orders && npm run migrate:products
scripts.migrate:jaws-with-deps: npm run migrate:offices && npm run migrate:profiles && npm run migrate:doctors && npm run migrate:patients && npm run migrate:orders && npm run migrate:products && npm run migrate:jaws
scripts.migrate:projects-and-plans: npm run migrate:projects && npm run migrate:treatment-plans
scripts.validate:projects-and-plans: npm run validate:projects && npm run validate:treatment-plans
scripts.rollback:projects-and-plans: npm run rollback:treatment-plans && npm run rollback:projects

description: Data migration scripts for offices, profiles, doctors, patients, orders and their relationships
